scene_john_lily.speaker: John RPG
scene_john_lily.line: My name is John... RPG is just what people called me.

scene_john_lily.speaker: Lily
scene_john_lily.line: My power is my responsibility, I will use it for rights.

scene_john_mary.line: My name is John... RPG is just what people called me.

scene_john_mary.speaker: Mary
scene_john_mary.line: If my power is a compass, then I am a guide.

scene_luke_cole.speaker: Luke
scene_luke_cole.line: My name is Luke! I'm glad I can help you!

scene_adira_kiara.speaker: Adira
scene_adira_kiara.line: Kiara, stay close. I don’t want anything happening to you out there.

scene_adira_kiara.speaker: Kiara
scene_adira_kiara.line: Don’t worry, sis... I can handle myself. But you better not get hurt either!!

scene_adira_land.speaker: Adira
scene_adira_land.line: I'm Adira of Templar. I'll never stop until there are no enemies left.

scene_adira_land.speaker: Land
scene_adira_land.line: I'm Land the Lancer. Call me anytime you need the help.

scene_kiara_land.line: My sis is the best, don't you agree?!

scene_kiara_land.speaker: Land
scene_kiara_land.line: I'm Land the Lancer. Call me anytime you need the help.

scene_kiara_timmie.line: My sis is the best, don't you agree?!

scene_kiara_cole.line: My sis is the best, don't you agree?!

scene_timmie_cole.speaker: Timmie
scene_timmie_cole.line: I am no one... just left me alone.

taunt_john.speaker: John RPG
taunt_john.line: I don't know who you are. Well... I don't even know who I am.

taunt_john.speaker: John RPG
taunt_john.line: They called me a hero for a reason, so brace yourself!

taunt_john.speaker: John RPG
taunt_john.line: Look, I don’t even know how I got here, but you for sure don't wanna mess with me!

taunt_lily.speaker: Lily
taunt_lily.line: The light will guide me to end this darkness.

taunt_lily.speaker: Lily
taunt_lily.line: I fight not for myself, but for the light of this world.

taunt_mary.speaker: Mary
taunt_mary.line: I don't wish to harm you, this is an atonement...

taunt_mary.speaker: Mary
taunt_mary.line: I offer this to you as a reconciliation...

taunt_mary.speaker: Mary
taunt_mary.line: Please accept this as my effort to compensate for your wrongs...

taunt_luke.speaker: Luke
taunt_luke.line: It's not too late to do a good thing!

taunt_luke.speaker: Luke
taunt_luke.line: I'll make you stop those evil acts!

taunt_adira.speaker: Adira
taunt_adira.line: Don't you dare stand in my path.

taunt_adira.speaker: Adira
taunt_adira.line: This will be your last mistake.

taunt_adira.speaker: Adira
taunt_adira.line: Move aside, or prepare to face your death.

taunt_kiara.speaker: Kiara
taunt_kiara.line: Huh? Did you just look at my sister without permission!? I’ll end you!

taunt_kiara.speaker: Kiara
taunt_kiara.line: Don't you dare think of touching my sis! I’ll crush you!!

taunt_kiara.speaker: Kiara
taunt_kiara.line: You're nothing compared to my sis! So, get out of my sight!!

taunt_land.speaker: Land
taunt_land.line: Did you just call me Land without the Lancer? That's unforgivable.

taunt_land.speaker: Land
taunt_land.line: I became a lancer because it’s the path to true power... and horses are awesome.

taunt_land.speaker: Land
taunt_land.line: You won’t understand the weight of my name, this is my legacy!

taunt_timmie.speaker: Timmie
taunt_timmie.line: Step on the wood... and you will never be found.

taunt_timmie.speaker: Timmie
taunt_timmie.line: The forest is my domain, you are now under my shadow.

taunt_timmie.speaker: Timmie
taunt_timmie.line: I know your weakness…and when I strike, you’ll never see it coming!

taunt_cole.speaker: Cole
taunt_cole.line: P-Please don’t hit me... I’m just trying to survive here!

taunt_cole.speaker: Cole
taunt_cole.line: I-I’m fully armored, so... I’ll be fine, right? Right...?

taunt_cole.speaker: Cole
taunt_cole.line: This axe is so heavy... please don’t make me swing it!!

taunt_adira_kiara.speaker: Adira
taunt_adira_kiara.line: Step aside, Kiara. You don’t need to fight me to prove anything.

taunt_adira_kiara.speaker: Kiara
taunt_adira_kiara.line: *sniff* I wanna be your number one fan! I gotta show you I’m worthy of being your sister!!
